com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Interface SpenPageDoc.ObjectSelectedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SpenPageDoc

    public static interface SpenPageDoc.ObjectSelectedListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving object selection events.
    Use the following method to register the listener:
    See Also:
    SpenPageDoc.setObjectSelectedListener(ObjectSelectedListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onObjectSelected(SpenPageDoc page, ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList, boolean selected)
      Called when an object on a page is selected

    • Method Detail

      • onObjectSelected

        void onObjectSelected(SpenPageDoc page,
                    ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList,
                    boolean selected)
        Called when an object on a page is selected
        Parameters:
        page - The current page instance.
        objectList - The list of selected objects
        selected - Set to true when objects are selected, set to false when objects are unselected.
